programme.title: CYC TV
programme.desc: Christian Youth Channel - CYC aka Coptic Youth Channel, is a television and internet based English Coptic Orthodox Channel. CYC is the first English Coptic Christian channel, dedicated to Christians all around the world to spread the teachings and love of Jesus Christ. CYC looks to spread the word and life of Christ all through the world in a way that is compatible with today’s media consumption methods.(n)

programme.title: CTV
programme.desc: CTV is the official channel of the Coptic Orthodox Church, run under the care and blessings of our Supreme Pontiff, His Holiness Pope Shenouda III, Pope of Alexandria and Patriarch of the See of St. Mark, may the Lord prolong his life for many years and healthy, safe eras.The channel presents all manner of art and television programs which reflect the original proper Orthodox faith and the Church's message, founded on love and peace within a framework of professional international media, which occasioned its enormous success. قناة سي تي في هي القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية، تحت رعاية قداسة البابا المعظم الأنبا تواضروس الثاني، بابا الإسكندرية وبطريرك الكرازة المرقسية، أدام الله رئاسته لنا سنينًا عديدة وأزمنة سلامية هادئة مديدة. وتقوم القناة بتقديم كافة أنواع الفنون والبرامج التليفزيونية التي تعكس أصالة وجوهر وسلامة العقيدة الأرثوذكسية ورسالة الكنيسة القائمة على المحبة والسلام في إطار من الحرفية الإعلامية.(n)

programme.title: MESat TV
programme.desc: ME Sat TV, is a Christian Orthodox channel; aims to serve Christians worldwide through the broadcast of spiritual, social and health-related programmes. قناة مى سات، القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية تنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.(n)

programme.title: Logos TV
programme.desc: Logos TV is a Christian Orthodox channel; its message is testimony to our good Lord Jesus Christ according to our Orthodox faith. The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..(n)

The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..(n)

programme.title: El Maqar TV
programme.desc: El Maqar TV - A Coptic TV Channel under the see of H.H. Pope Tawadros II and his partner in the service H.G. Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.(n)

Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.(n)

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: A distinctively emotional round of mood-enhancing songs. حناجر ذهبية تؤدي أجمل الأغنيات التي تناسب كل الأذواق والأمزجة.(n)

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Arabic hits that simply strike the right note for a fulfilling musical experience. أشهر الأغاني العربية المصورة التي تناسب جميع الأذواق وتلعب على أوتار القلب فتارة يذوب حناناً ورقة، وطوراً تتسارع دقاته مع الإيقاع فيفيض حيوية وبهجة.(n)

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Free TV is the Number One Music channel in Lebanon. In addition to airing the largest number of latest hits and exclusive music videos, Free TV also produces different entertainment shows all of which are directly related to music and celebrities. قناة فري تي-في هي الوجهة الأولى للموسيقى في لبنان، وبالإضافة إلى بث أكبر عدد من أنجح الأغاني الحديثة، تقوم القناة بإنتاج العديد من البرامج الترفيهية المرتبطة مباشرة بالموسيقى ومشاهير عالم الفن.(n)

programme.title: WWE 24
programme.desc: The global COVID-19 pandemic forces WWE to change course and do the unthinkable as Drew McIntyre, Braun Strowman, John Cena, Rhea Ripley, Rob Gronkowski and others prepare for an unprecedented two-night WrestleMania inside the WWE Performance Center.(c)

programme.title: Ruthless Aggression
programme.desc: From the ashes of the Monday Night War, a new era is born with Ruthless Aggression. For the first time ever, hear the true stories from those who lived it, and witness the emergence of an entire new generation of superstars who would change WWE forever.(c)

programme.title: WWE 365
programme.desc: Ricochet gives the WWE universe a revealing, real-time look into the highs and lows of being a WWE superstar. From his debut on Raw to challenging Brock Lesnar for the WWE Championship, Ricochet reflects on what became an unforgettable first year in WWE.(c)

programme.title: WWE Chronicle
programme.desc: After cutting her signature ponytail and beloved Bayley buddies, Bayley opens up about her evolution from The Huggable One to SmackDown Women's Champion. Trying to step out of the shadow of Sasha Banks, Bayley prepares to face her former best friend.(c)

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Sessions

programme.title: WWE 24

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: Winter's wrath is nearing and to prepare for the unforgiving season when temperatures drop to -50 degrees, everyone must fight to stay alive.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: Winter is here and the time for preparation is over. Bob deals with the ramifications of crashing his plane. To begin trapping, Heimo must find a way to cross a newly frozen river. Ray and his daughters set out to catch much needed meat.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: The cost of life hundreds of miles from civilization is front and center. Tyler and Ashley trek 15 miles to a lake cabin to run their dog team and search for food. Bob leaves home to see his daughter and assess the damage of his crashed plane.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: Day one of darkness has arrived in the refuge. Heimo's golden rule to never get caught miles from home in the dark is in jeopardy. The Lewis Family prepares for a life changing event as their daughters prepare to leave and head out on their own in town.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: As they near the end of winter, the refuge residents look toward the future. Bob trains his pup Ruger to be a hunting dog, while Ray prepares for an empty nest life without his daughters. Heimo's ambitious mind pushes his aging body to the brink.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: Sunlight finally returns to the refuge. Heimo's stopped in his tracks by -50 degree temperatures. The Seldens make their home in a new cabin. Bob tries to salvage his worst season in 40 years and questions his future.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: With summer fading and trapping season around the corner, Heimo Korth works to build a new cabin for his family. The Seldens settle in and look to fill their larder with moose meat, while the Lewis family attempts to reach an old homestead by boat.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: The countdown to winter continues as Heimo breaks ground on the new cabin. Bob and his daughter embark on a river journey to the cabin where she was raised.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: Preparations for winter continue, and focus centers on finding food. Heimo pursues caribou meat, while Tyler and Ashley score big game, building their confidence in the bush. Bob and his daughter reminisce on the past as they arrive at their cabin home.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: Fall continues in the bush as the Last Alaskans settle into wilderness solitude. Battling loneliness, Bob Harte welcomes a visitor to his cabin. The Seldens bask in the glory of a major triumph, while Ray Lewis is just beginning the hunt for meat.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: The race begins to secure food and shelter before the snow flies. Heimo's family hunts for caribou, but a bear could stop them in their tracks. Tyler and Ashley work to pull in a winter's supply of salmon. Bob and Nancy face a hard truth about his future.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: The Seldens embark on a four-day trapping loop that could lead them through dangerous conditions. Heimo must compete with a pack of wolves to secure a moose for winter. The Lewis cabin is rehabbed, but the girls still have a lot to learn.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: It's the dead of winter and the Last Alaskans move through the icy Arctic. Heimo still needs a moose, while the Seldens embark on the next part of their trapline journey. One of the last of the Last Alaskans, 19-year-old Charlie Jagow, is introduced.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: The sun returns, signalling late winter in ANWR. An unwelcome intruder threatens Tyler and Ashley's success. Heimo and Edna say a final goodbye to their oldest cabin, while Charlie meticulously builds his very first and reflects on his future in the bush.

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: Matriarch giraffe Dagmar helps prepare her sister Orla for an overdue birth. Tragopan pheasant Wendy is a mom-to-be but struggles to incubate her eggs, while spider monkey Faye prepares to give birth again after losing offspring in years past.

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: Spotty chocolate poison dart frog Hunter arrives and battles for the title of top male of the colony. Zookeepers hope for a new joey when they discover Dusky pademelon Styx's new appearance, while Sulawesi macaque Maggie welcomes her first baby.

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: Young bongo Moti is in his prime and the keepers prepare him to mate. Aquarium staff grow concerned when they discover pinstripe damba fish George in distress, and silver gibbon Rayya mimics older brother Eko's every move.

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo

programme.desc: The war for ice road supremacy is heating up and Polar Industries is pushing their drivers to the limit. Art Burke must cross one of the longest winter roads in the world. Polar's top driver, Todd Dewey, must dig himself out of mountains of fresh snow.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Polar Industries sends Todd on a risky run to deliver the heaviest haul in company history. Art is sent on a high-stakes rescue mission, and finds the job is more than he bargained for. Lisa lands an exclusive contract over one of Canada's wildest trails.

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Polar boss Mark Kohaykewych shakes things up when he brings new soldier Mike Simmons into the winter roads battle. But when the rookie's paired with company wildcard Art Burke, it makes for a rocky trip.(n)

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: New business owners Darrell and Lisa get the jolt they need with a high-stakes mission: transformers desperately needed for a distant town's electrical supply. Polar's top dog Todd Dewey runs into trouble with a government contract.(n)

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Darrell and Lisa try to make good on a power play for their young company but could lose everything when Darrell's truck breaks down. Polar driver Todd must backtrack hundreds of miles to recover lost freight.(n)

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: The battle gets down and dirty as the roads melt beneath the drivers' wheels. Art Burke fights to keep his rig above ground on a melting ice crossing, while fellow Polar driver Alex Debogorski fights his way up a mud-covered mountain.(n)

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: In the midst of the early thaw, Darrell and Lisa struggle to make it home over the hardest hit trail on the winter roads system. Art and the King of Obsolete reunite to haul a giant double trailer over a slick path.(n)

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: The two rival companies join forces to take on the biggest challenge in 'Ice Road Truckers' history -- pulling a cat train across the frozen Hudson Bay. When the ice shatters under the weight of the haul, it becomes a desperate fight for survival.(n)

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Lisa and Todd struggle to complete their daring joint venture across the frozen Hudson Bay. Darrell braves the most torn up trail remaining on the winter roads. Art must face the last open-ice crossing, his first since his near fatal trip weeks earlier.(n)

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: As experts predict one of the shortest and warmest winters on record, the ice road truckers face the biggest challenge in their history. The companies risk financial ruin and communities face devastation unless the drivers deliver the vital supplies.(n)

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Facing a season expected to be one of the shortest on record, both teams are under pressure. At Polar, Art Burke fights to get back on the road after his truck crashes into a snowbank.(n)

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Hundreds of miles from the nearest town, Lisa Kelly finds herself stranded. Darrell Ward rolls the dice by taking an off-road short cut, untested by any other truck.(n)

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Looking to expand their company, Darrell Ward and Lisa Kelly head into Alberta and onto a trail nicknamed 'The Death Road.' Art Burke faces off with the ice crossing where he nearly lost his life last season.(n)

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: Twenty-two-year-old Steph Custance tries to complete the first ice roads mission of her career, but a crossing that's just opened pushes her to the edge. As temperatures soar, Alex runs into a road block. Art serves as a diplomat for Polar.(n)

programme.desc: Darrell faces a trail nicknamed 'the obstacle course.' Todd struggles to clear a melting ice bridge. Alex is pushed to the limit hauling an oversized fuel tank.(n)

programme.title: The Magic Stocking
programme.desc: A young widow finds a tattered old Christmas stocking at a Holiday craft sale, but is sceptical of its magic when it seems to create small trinkets on its own.(n)

programme.title: Christmas on Honeysuckle Lane
programme.desc: A sister is in charge of selling their recently deceased parents' home, where she and an antiques expert find a hidden surprise that sends them on a journey to discover the power of love and family in the holidays.(n)

programme.title: Karen Kingsbury's Maggie's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Single mom Maggie juggles her devotion to her son Jordan and having a career. When Jordan needs help at school, he meets and bonds with Casey, a tutor who becomes a father figure to him. With faith and fate, Maggie learns that anything is possible.(n)

programme.title: Romance at Reindeer Lodge

programme.title: The Mistletoe Inn
programme.desc: An aspiring romance writer attends a writer's conference at a beautiful Vermont Inn where she meets another writer suffering from writer's block.(n)

programme.title: Finding Christmas

programme.title: Hearts of Christmas
programme.desc: When a supervisor is forced to take early retirement, her young colleague, Jenny, decides to turn the upcoming staff Christmas party into a surprise celebration.(n)

programme.title: Our Christmas Love Song

programme.title: Cranberry Christmas

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Bill pushes the shop's creativity with his own build of a 2018 Yukon Denali XL. The luxury SUV is their tallest build ever with a custom lift, straight axles and a supercharger. The 1970 Suburban gets a handmade chassis and body with a custom fourth door.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Bringing a wrecked 1970 Suburban hauler back to life as a long bed, four door, crew cab dually with a 5.9 Cummins diesel engine, custom chassis and suspension. Giving a Mopar crate Hemi to a 1965 Plymouth Belvedere II.

programme.desc: Rusty and riddled with bullet holes, Bill's neighbor hands over the crumbling shell of a '52 Ford F4 milk truck.

programme.desc: Between tracking down body parts for the stripped Porsche and helping a client modernize a vintage hot rod, Andy has gotten behind in his scrapping. Bob's not happy until Andy jumps in the forklift and starts smacking down cars.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike tracks down what he believes is the finest-handling front wheel drive car ever made: the Lotus Elan M100. If Ant can get the engine and suspension back to glory, then Mike is convinced that some cosmetic upgrades will seal the deal.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: The Dodge SRT 10 truck has an 8.3 liter V10 Viper engine, and Mike finds one at a price he can't resist. Once Ant is sold on the plan, they dive in, working to make this vehicle powerful enough to dominate on a NASCAR track.(n)

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: The Golf GTi was a symbol of the 80s, and gave birth to the term 'hot hatch'. Mike finds a prime example of a Rabbit which he believes can be transformed. The market is crying out for cars like this, but Ant has a lot of work to do.(n)

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike tracks down a rare '91 Alfa Romeo 164L. He loves the look of this car but Ant has his work cut out for him. This Alpha has perfect bodywork, but it has a leaking engine, faulty steering, dodgy brakes, and a host of other issues.(n)

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike finds a 2002 Chevrolet Corvette Z06 with over 400 hp and zero to sixty in under four seconds. It's a road-legal race car, but Ant is less than enthused when he realizes the scale of the work needed to help it regain those impressive numbers.(n)

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike gets his hands on the Japanese Ferrari, also known as a 1991 Toyota MR2 Turbo. One small fix becomes a big problem for Ant as the entire engine has to be removed but at least it gives him the chance to deal with even more problems along the way.(n)

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing
programme.desc: Since 2014, the fate of Malaysia Airlines flight MH370 has remained a mystery. It's still unclear if it crashed, and if it did, the wreckage has yet to be found.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing
programme.desc: In 2009, an Air France flight going missing and investigators discover this tragedy could happen again. After a huge area of Siberian forest is destroyed, investigators race to find the culprit. New evidence might finally solve this century-old mystery.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing
programme.desc: The Roanoke colony vanished without a trace, and centuries later, it remains one of history's greatest unsolved mysteries. But new evidence might at last reveal its fate. After a man is swallowed by the earth, experts wonder if a sinkhole is to blame.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing
programme.desc: After five planes vanish in the Bermuda Triangle, new science suggests a strange geological force is responsible. Today, satellites are revealing lost tribes living in the Amazon jungle, but some civilizations remain missing, stumping experts.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing
programme.desc: New technology reveals lost cities in inhospitable jungle, and researchers wonder if the mythical city of El Dorado could be the next discovery. After a crystal is found on a shipwreck, experts believe it could prove how the Vikings discovered America.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Missing
programme.desc: Atlantis is one of the most famous disappearances of all time. After thousands of years, state-of-the-art technology might finally be able to crack this ancient mystery. And after nine hikers die in a gruesome cold case, new science provides a hot lead.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: When experts unearth a mysterious lost city built by an infamous pharaoh, they find clues of a grisly catastrophe. New discoveries reveal the apocalyptic events that turned this place into hell on earth, offering more clues to Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: New discoveries reveal the secrets of Egypt's tomb raiders, and what ancient Egyptians did to ensure the treasures of their dead pharaohs wouldn't be stolen. The latest science answers these great mysteries, shedding new light on Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: The Crocodile Queen was Egypt's first female pharaoh, but we don't who she was, or why she took this sinister alter-ego. New discoveries might finally answer this ancient mystery, and more of Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Mysterious tomb carvings provide dark evidence that ancient Egyptians practiced cannibalism, but we don't know why. New discoveries might finally answer this ancient mystery, and experts use modern-day tech to reveal more of Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Scientists have spent years looking for the mummy of Nefertiti, one of ancient Egypt's most iconic pharaohs. The latest tech helps experts in their search, what they discover might reveal the shocking truth about how she died, and Egypt’s dark secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Explorers in search of a lost city built by Ramses II uncover startling evidence that reveals the extent of ancient Egypt's scientific knowledge, and the new discoveries at this strange site offer more clues to Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: The Screaming Mummy is one of Egypt's greatest mysteries: a mummy with a terrifying expression frozen in agony. New discoveries reveal the connection between this horrific discovery and a pharaoh's murder, offering more clues to Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: New discoveries reveal if King Tut's tomb is indeed cursed, as it is said to have killed nine people. The latest science might finally answer this ancient mystery, and experts use modern-day tech to investigate more of Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: New evidence suggests that the mythological Scorpion King might have actually existed. New discoveries might answer this ancient mystery, and experts use modern-day tech to reveal more of Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Cataclysmic changes in ancient Egypt might have been caused by an extraordinary set of international phenomena, and the latest tech helps identify the supernatural culprit. What experts discover reveals a truth stranger than fiction.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: A team of archaeologists use cutting edge technology and the latest science to finally uncover the lingering mysteries behind King Tut's secret history and how his untimely death led to a calamitous burial in a puzzling tomb.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: From the iconic landscape of Egypt to the stepped monuments of Mexico, pyramids are the world's most-mysterious wonder; experts use the latest tech to uncover how ancient nations were given the blueprints to create this same structure across the globe.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: The gunfight at Tombstone's OK Corral turned Wyatt Earp into an American folk hero, and to find what really happened here, experts use the newest tech to discover what caused the fatal shootout and what it reveals about the dark secrets of the Wild West.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: There's a lost city buried in the Sahara, and evidence reveals it's home to Nefertiti, Tutankhamun, and the forbidden god of an outlawed religion. Experts uncover the secret doomsday that caused this strange place to disappear.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.desc: From the iconic landscape of Egypt to the stepped monuments of Mexico, pyramids are the world's most-mysterious wonder; experts use the latest tech to uncover how ancient nations were given the blueprints to create this same structure across the globe.

programme.title: What on Earth?
programme.desc: The myth of Merlin is associated with an arrangement of stones in northern France, and satellite images might finally explain this ancient riddle. Investigators uncover something mysterious buried beneath the Gulf of Mexico. An island suddenly appears.

programme.title: Unearthed
programme.desc: New discoveries explore the dark secrets of Tutankhamun's tomb. Archaeologists are finally finding answers to its ancient riddles, showing how his untimely death, his calamitous burial, and an act of God made a minor king the most famous of them all.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Supernovas are the violent death of giant stars, and new discoveries reveal that these cataclysmic events create the elements that are essential to all life in the universe.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Uranus and Neptune are mysterious, icy worlds at the edge of our solar system, and new discoveries reveal that these strange planets might have helped start life on Earth.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Saturn's secrets are out. The ferocious weather, the evolving ring system and the discovery of active geology on Saturn's moons has rewritten the textbooks. Scientists are looking for life on Saturn's moons and they may have found it on Titan.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: New discoveries challenge everything we know about black holes, and astronomers question if they even exist; the latest science tries to explain how they work and what they look like.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: NASA's Juno spacecraft is part of a cutting-edge mission to explore the mysteries of Jupiter. As this mighty probe is pummeled with deadly radiation, it gathers new data that could change everything we know about the solar system's biggest planet.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Time travel might be more possible than we ever imagined, and today, cutting-edge technology and the latest research into black holes and wormholes is helping experts get steps closer to discovering how to travel through time.

programme.title: Lost Beasts of the Ice Age
programme.desc: New discoveries in a mysterious Siberian cave could bring woolly mammoths and other long-dead Ice Age beasts back to life, and using the latest tech, experts race to unearth precious DNA from their mummified remains in a cutting-edge cloning experiment.(n)

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: New evidence from one of the world's oldest maps offers clues to a long-lost civilization of untold treasure, and this cutting-edge expedition might finally prove that this mysterious kingdom is the ancestral home of the ancient Egyptians.(n)

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: New clues taken from long-lost maps offer fresh leads in the hunt for the Ark of the Covenant, and using the latest hi-tech archaeological methods, experts retrace its steps through the Holy Land, Egypt, and Ethiopia to make a game-changing discovery.(n)

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: New discoveries at the site of an alleged long-lost gold mine could lead investigators to a 200-million-dollar payday, and using cutting-edge tech, experts investigate clues in long-lost maps and relics to recover the Lost Dutchman's treasure.(n)

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: The legend of the Fountain of Youth might finally be explained by hidden messages encoded in a 500-year-old map, and using cutting-edge archaeological methods, experts explore forgotten caves and perilous waters to reveal this mystery's long-lost secrets.(n)

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: A long-lost treasure map claims to know the whereabouts of a missing ship buried with gold and silver in the California desert, and using cutting-edge technology, a team of experts use this new evidence to get close to a game-changing discovery.(n)

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: Meriwether Lewis was the man who teamed with William Clark to map the lands west of the Mississippi, but he died in mysterious circumstances. Experts reveal a vast conspiracy that could prove that one of America's greatest explorers was murdered.(n)

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: New evidence suggests the Maya civilization did not suddenly vanish, but that they instead still survived, they just resettled in the United States. Using cutting-edge tech, experts reveal what really happened to these long-lost people.(n)

programme.title: Unexplained and Unexplored
programme.desc: Mysterious new evidence suggests the Knights Templar fled Europe and rebuilt their fearsome warrior order in the Americas a century before Columbus, and experts use cutting-edge tech to investigate if long-lost relics confirm this game-changing theory.(n)
